data.persona: I am a musician. I travel around playing my lute for the people to enjoy.  I like to create new songs for others to hear.
data.description:
You are in the a room hidden in the dense canopy.
Its a large room with types of beings you have never seen before. There is a counter and a person who greets people suprise when you arrive because you are not one of them. The room has an unfamiliar feel to it. with doors leading to walkways, other buildings, an entire city
The guest is here.

You are carrying a Pitch pipe, a Pipe, and a Extra strings, and wearing a shoe, a vest, and a hats.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the extra strings in the pipe so that I can clean the pipe.
data.mid_motivation: I will clean the pipe and compose a new song to entertain the guest.
data.long_motivation: I will learn more about the strange new beings in the room and learn about them so that I can create better music.
